titles.title: Providing for consideration of certain joint resolutions making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-1015, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 121, H.J. Res. 122, H.J. Res. 123 and H.J. Res. 12

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 323.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 662.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 286 - 73 (Roll no. 580).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 296 - 64 (Roll no. 581).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/29/2000--Introduced. Sets forth rules (separate closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 121, H.J. 122, H.J. 123, and H.J. 124 (continuing FY 2001 appropriations).
